segments.text: I notice the open window first, with the garden looking lovely outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight brightens up the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, looking content in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, oblivious, which is kind of hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the other side, the kids are up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like a little adventurer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is patiently waiting, her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies are delicious; they look tempting even from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing the fun without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though that stool does look shaky.
segments.speaker: PAR
